page.title: 13THE PET SHOP
page.content: Mr Trainer is the man who owns the pet shop,he has been a shopkeeper for 10 years,the pet shop has been there 7 years and he has owned the shop 4 years.Some of his stock comes in bulk and some comes from abroad.He sells birds like budgies,cockatoos and parrots.The pet shop is open six days a week.He gets kittens but not often, when he does they go really soon but he won't keep them for more than three days.The animal food that sells most for cats and dogs is rabbit flavour,it is 46p a tin.The hampsters he sells are about Â£4.00.He sells cows hooves for dogs to chew.He has sold some puppies before but he doesn't sell them often.Everyday people buy toys for cats,dogs etc.In the shop there is the basement where he lives, and the 1st floor and the pet shop is the ground floor.He also sell plants.
